mapper.insert: insert into notice (notice_type, notice_id, member_id, sender_id, send_date, notice_contents, url) values (#{notice_Type}, #{notice_ID}, #{member_ID}, #{sender_ID}, #{send_Date}, #{notice_Contents}, #{url, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select count(notice_id) from notice where member_id=#{member_ID} and confirm_read = 'N'
select notice_id, notice_type, send_date, notice_contents, confirm_read, url from notice where member_id = #{member_ID} order by confirm_read, send_date desc
mapper.update: update notice set confirm_read = 'Y' where notice_type = #{notice_Type} and member_id = #{member_ID}
